name: Bazza
description: a local bookmark manager, with passable files

browser_action.default_title: Bazza: a mate for your tabs

content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:8080 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:8080; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src * 'self' data: https:;
